file_content.text: Halt, you Hutt-slaying scum! The Cartel demands that you pay for your crimes!
No words, bone-lizard. Just fight.
Listen to the Wookiee boast of his murders! This monster has slaughtered entire Hutt clans, but his reign of terror ends!
Before he dies, he will know true fear! We Kaleesh warriors swear it by our blood!
Six against one hardly seems fair.
The Wookiee seems outnumbered.
That Wookiee's not afraid of you, pal.
Fear? I don't think so.
Has anybody seen Drooga the Hutt?
I'm looking for the host.
Keep back, you idiot! That beast will tear your head off, just like he did to Nor'dro the Fearless!
His claws are stained with the entrails of many! His bloodlust can't be satisfied!
Don't fear. You're not my enemy.
Warriors! Kill these scum!
Maybe we should stay outta this, Captain. That three-meter fur ball looks pretty fierce.
You see? This bloodthirsty barbarian slaughters everyone who crosses him. He must be destroyed!
You're making things up.
Shut up! Get out of our fight!
Bowdaar invites you to kill these bone-lizards with me.
Let's see what these Kaleesh are made of.
Sounds like a plan, big guy.
I can't believe we're actually doing this....
I start on the left. You go right. We meet in the middle.
Sorry, furry, but this isn't my fight.
No can do.
I'd much rather fight the Wookiee. Need a hand, guys?
You'd be a better opponent.
I'll let you boys sort things out.
Leave me out of this.
Warriors, show this Wookiee what it means to face Kaleesh!
How about I help?
We are Kaleesh warriors! We don't need help!
Enough words! Fight!
